column2: Being at sea for a long time has made me feel ill. And it is not a matter of being seasick mind you. I feel very tired, have constant pain in my legs and whenever I wake up, my joints ache all over.

After being examined by my physician [physician.GetFirstName], [physician.GetSheHe] told me to take it easy during the coming weeks. I am also instructed to eat a special diet consisting mostly of fruit and vegetables in order to cure my Scurvy.
After eating plenty of different fruit and vegetables, I finally feel well. The pain is gone and I am in a much better state! I am sure to avoid scurvy if I eat an orange.
You can no longer ignore the irritation in your throat, you begin to violently cough.
One moment you are shivering, the next you are sweating, and overall you feel awful.
A sudden gurgling and feeling of pressure in your gut is all the warning you have before you are forced to make a dash for the privy.
A queasy feeling overcomes you and you feel an immediate urge to vomit.
A dull pain begins to throb behind your eyes.
A sudden shooting pain strikes your chest. After a moment of agony it passes... for now.
You double over in pain as you are suddenly beset by painful cramps.
Alerted by a growing feeling of itchiness, you are appalled to notice the appearance of a bright red rash on your body.
Sharp pains in your abdomen cause you to clutch at your stomach.
As the day drags on, seemingly never ending, you can barely keep your eyes open. You seem to have no energy at all.
Although you can't quite put your finger on what's wrong, you don't feel quite right.
Your swollen lymphs have blackened and burst, spewing out blood and pus. You have contracted the Plague.
What started out as a mere cough has now turned into shaking chills, shortness of breath and stabs of severe pain in the chest. You have contracted Pneumonia.
Repulsive sores and abscesses are spreading across your body, originating from the groin. You have contracted the Great Pox.
You are thrown between waves of chills and sweats. Food has lost its appeal and no amount of sleep seems to remedy your fatigue. You have contracted Consumption.
You feel as if you are burning up and at times you have difficulties distinguishing between dreams and reality. You have contracted Slow Fever.
Yesterday lesions appeared on your face and swiftly spread across your body. Now they have turned to blisters filled with pus. You have contracted Smallpox.
You are suffering a high fever and a red, itching rash has slowly spread across your entire body. You have contracted Measles.
You are confined to your bed, your body racked with aches and chills. You have contracted the Flu.
You spend most of your waking hours on the privy, where you frequently pass a loose, bloody stool. You have contracted Dysentery.
You are pained with hot, swollen joints which disturb your sleep. You have contracted Gout.
When you are not passing a loose stool in the chamber pot, you are bent over it, retching. You are suffering from Food Poisoning.
You feel possessed, full of uncontrollable excitement and irrational fears! You have contracted Rabies.
The symptoms which have troubled you lately were a sign of something much worse. You have Cancer.
Repulsive sores and abscesses are spreading across your body, originating from the groin. You are Syphilitic.
Your mind is clouded and a dull red rash is spreading across your body. You feel hot and your joints ache. You have contracted Camp Fever.
Maybe we should head back to port...
If you say so.
Er... door hinge?
Call for my Court Physician at once!
So [From.GetSheHe] is the one who brought this upon me! What a [GetRootFromInsult]!
I will show that [GetRootFromInsult] what I do with traitors!
Imprison §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[syphilis_lover.GetTitledFirstName]§!, whom your spies believe is [From.GetHerHis] lover.\n
Imprison §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
Sickness and death awaits us all. Stop pestering me.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], am I to blame? I will not give up until [From.GetSheHe] is well again!
The poor thing! I will do what I can for [From.GetHerHim].
Take care of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, attempting to nurse [From.GetHerHim] back to health.\n

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has not been [From.GetHerselfHimself] lately. I have noticed how [From.GetSheHe] has lost weight and been overcome by episodes of intense fatigue. Apparently the underlying cause is cancerous growth which is sucking the life out of [From.GetHerHim].

During the last few days my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been clutching at [From.GetHerHis] stomach and made frequent visits to the privy. I have now been informed that [From.GetSheHe] is suffering from dysentery.
Recently I have noticed the pitiful state of my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName]. I have just been informed that the cause of [From.GetHerHis] aches and fatigue is a case of the flu.
During the last few days my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has not been able to keep any drink or food down. It seems as if [From.GetSheHe] is suffering from food poisoning.

For some time now, my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been complaining about [From.GetHerHis] painful joints. Apparently they frequently swell up, becoming hot and aching for several hours.
These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by strange rashes and a high fever. I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed measles.

These are dark days. When my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], was beset by a high fever and could not stop vomiting, we feared the worst. The suspicions are now confirmed. [From.GetHerHisCap] affliction is indeed the dreaded plague.
For some time now my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been overcome with fatigue and troubled by a persistent cough. I have now been informed that the symptoms are due to pneumonia.

I have received word from a jailer who has been caring for my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. Not only is the [From.GetGirlWomanBoyMan] locked away in a dark cell - [From.GetSheHe] is now suffering from [From.GetScriptedDiseaseName].

During the last few days, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been acting strangely indeed! I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] aggressive behaviour and episodes of extreme anxiety have been caused by rabies.
These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by oozing lesions and a high fever. I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed smallpox.

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has not been quite [From.GetHerselfHimself] lately. For a while now, I have noticed [From.GetHerHim] looking tired and thin. I have just been informed of the cause - [From.GetFirstName] has contracted syphilis!

These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been growing weaker and weaker over the last few weeks and I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed consumption.

These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by a high fever for several days and I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed slow fever.

These are dark days. My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been beset by strange rashes and episodes of delirium over the last few weeks. I have just been informed that [From.GetHerHis] affliction is indeed camp fever.

For some time now, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been avoiding me. [From.GetSheHeCap] has not visited my bedchamber for several weeks. When I have demanded to know why [From.GetSheHe] has given me nothing but feeble excuses. Today I overheard a couple of [From.GetHerHis] servants gossiping. They said [From.GetFirstName] has contracted syphilis!
I must find a court physician!
You shouldn't believe everything you hear. Surely there's another reason.
You there – tend to my [GetFromRelation] immediately!
Guards! It is time we release my poor [GetFromRelation] from prison.

I can no longer bear the revulsion of the faces of the people I meet. Although most try to hide their reaction, I have grown to recognize even the slightest flinch when their gaze tracks over my face.\nNo more! I will accept that I am disfigured and don a mask.
